website_summaries.verdict: This no-frills, envelope-style clutch will get you through event security with ease. Add a scarf for a pop of color when you're not at the stadium.
pros: Envelope-style clutch made of PVC plastic
Can easily store business cards, phone, wallet and sunglasses
cons: Snap closures can pop off relatively easily

customer_reviews.title: KILLER however darling... :(
customer_reviews.text: The purse is killer however the hardware is not all that great. unboxing was wonderful loved it showed my friends pics they loved it I love a big clutch and pvc made it fashion forward once I tried to open the bag, it open, it had a tight clasp which I liked however once I tried to close it I realized the button actually popped off which made me PISSED I wish I had signed back on to meet my return period however I just got back in town.. I’d love another that wasn’t defective! I didn’t get to wear her out, hopefully the vendor will send me out a good to exchange 👀
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Clearly Fashionable!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and clever - for fashion minded folks with ideas of their own - this bag is great to use as a blank slate. Add a colourful scarf inside the clear clutch etc.. and you will understand what I mean!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja's stuff

customer_reviews.title: Love this purse
customer_reviews.text: Love this purse. I wore it with a scarf in the purse to add a little color to compliment my outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Jones

customer_reviews.title: Clear clutch:)
customer_reviews.text: The bag needs a handle or strap. It works. I purchased these for my girlfriends and myself to have a clutch to use when going to football stadium games.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purse to complement transparent heels.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a transparent clutch bag that was simple, yet functional to complement a pair of transparent heels. This was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am able to match this clutch with my jelly sandal stilletos.. I have received a number of compliments. Its a good size and very trendy,
customer_reviews.author: Maria Munoz

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite accessory ❣️
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with my new clutch. I’ve gotten a ton of compliments .
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Clasp is sturdy. Easy to clean. & accommodates a lot more items at once than I was expecting. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Great size, Thank
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes,When I order, it does not come as expected. This item was exactly as expected. Great size, Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: KEEPING IT CUTE AND TOGETHER
customer_reviews.text: IT IS JUST THE CUTEST BAG I LOVE IT. IT GOES PERFECT WITH MY SHOES. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Girl

customer_reviews.title: very trendy and stylish, but...
customer_reviews.text: it's a little big for me, but I'm keeping it

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love it Is the right size Big enought and very cute Exactly What I was looking Yup

customer_reviews.title: Clutch
customer_reviews.text: I love this clutch. The clutch look just like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Tennille

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It’s perfect for all of my things. I can use it for NFL games, concerts, and more. I love how big it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jenae' Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I really like it.
customer_reviews.text: This clutch is on the large side and is very well made. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Tristyn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My clutch came on time and look exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: My clutch came on time and look exactly like the picture. It's the same size also. Its a must buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: nikkie grant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this clutch looks exactly like the pic. received so many compliments. A must buy!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's more larger than you would expect but loved it...

customer_reviews.title: Kute
customer_reviews.text: Very kute clutch..it was a lot bigger than i thought it would be..

customer_reviews.title: OMG THIS CLUTCH IS SO NICE AND I HAVE THE CLEAR BOOTS AND SHOES LADIES ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG THIS CLUTCH IS SO NICE AND I HAVE THE CLEAR BOOTS AND SHOES LADIES YOU ARE GOING TO LOVE THIS CLUCH. EVERYBODY ASK ME WERE DID YOU GET IT FORM. LOVE, LOVE IT :)

product_meta.title: Flada Women's PVC Clear Clutch Transparent Handbag Purse Casual Messenger Bag
feature_bullets: Fashion Women Clear Bag Envelope Clutch Purse Message Bag for Work
Material: Customized PVC Plastic. Hardware:silver.Waterproof and wipe clean easily
Large capacity, can storage your business cards, phone, wallet, sunglasses and some small article.
Perfect clear bag for work, meets NFL and PGA guidelines, perfect handbag choice and nice gift options for female friends
